title: Conservation of momentum - bar chart collision

content.description: Blocks <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> slide toward each other on a horizontal track, as shown in Figure <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"> <mn>1</mn> </math>.
